segments.text: Mary , do you often do your shopping online ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I'm used to online shopping . It ’ s convenient and time-saving . You can buy anything you want and they will send it to your home or any place you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can get the same product at a much lower price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Last week , I tried to buy some clothes online , but I didn ’ t know how to pay for them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should open an account at the online bank first . After that , you can buy anything online .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . You can find everything all over the world . Let ’ s check it out online !
segments.speaker: S2
